arts.ttl: Brighton vs. Fulham: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head record and previous meetings between Brighton and Fulham.

arts.ttl: Brighton and Hove Albion 1-1 Fulham: Player ratings
arts.sum: Zoe Wilkinson runs the rule over Fulham’s opening day displays as the Whites nick a last-gasp leveller on the south coast Bernd Leno: The German goalkeeper, who captained the Whites this afternoon, didn’t have an awful lot to do. He had little chance with Matt O’Riley’s calmly-converted penalty and made three other rather routine saves […]

arts.ttl: Brighton fan dies after falling ill at Fulham game
arts.sum: A 72-year-old Brighton supporter died after becoming unwell during the second half of Saturday's Premier League fixture against Fulham.

arts.ttl: Brighton fan dies after falling ill at Fulham game
arts.sum: A Brighton fan dies after becoming unwell during the second half of the club's opening Premier League game of the season against Fulham.
Muniz's last gasp equaliser secures us an opening day point

arts.ttl: Brighton 1-1 Fulham: Post-match Fulham player ratings
arts.sum: It was a good defensive performance from Fulham, but it lacked an attacking spark, something the club will look to improve in the transfer market after limited business. The winger looked a little off the pace as he struggled to get involved with play, touching the ball just 32 times.

arts.ttl: Late drama as Fulham rescue draw against Brighton
arts.sum: Rodrigo Muniz comes off the bench to score a 96th-minute equaliser as Fulham salvage a 1-1 draw against Brighton in the Premier League at the AMEX Stadium.

arts.ttl: SCENES! Muniz's stoppage-time strike helps Fulham snatch draw at Brighton
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League match between Brighton and Fulham.

arts.ttl: Muniz madness: Fulham rescue point against Brighton in dramatic league opener
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion took on Fulham in a Premier League game on Saturday at the Amex, and here Sports Mole looks at the highlights and stats from the clash.
